channel.title: Wtf? My Hardrive
channel.description:
Well I was going to download some programs, when I get a errror saying my hardrive is low in space.
Now I know this can't be because I have like 14gb free space, so I went and looked at my hardrive and yes it was down to 113mb!!!
I searched the drive to find out what was taking up so much dam space, when I come across my folder for my Xp account. I ran my mouse over it and it was saying there is 14gb of stuff in there!
I looked thru it and only found bout 1mb of stuff on there lol
Anyways I was wondering why the hell its doing this. Maybe there is like a critical error in the drive it self or something?
Well I think ill just end up deleteing this account, but first I'd like to hear from you guys.
Thanks, MoO

item.title: Wtf? My Hardrive
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

You got a new computer with only 14 GB of space :eek:?

You may also want to disable hibernate (if using XP). Go to Start > Control Panel > Performance and Maintenance > Power Options > Hibernate tab and uncheck the box.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf? My Hardrive
item.dc:creator: @MoO MoO
item.description:
@MoO wrote:

k, Couldn’t be system restores cuz I only have 1

Just got this comp

Ill run the disk clean up and if that doesnt work ill just delete the account and make a new one

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf? My Hardrive
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

use disk cleanup and delete all system restorepoints except the most recent.

Read full topic
